thread.section_title: Mesut Ozil insists his Arsenal future has nothing to do with Arsene Wenger staying – Metro
thread.title: Mesut Ozil insists his Arsenal future has nothing to do with Arsene Wenger staying
thread.title_full: Mesut Ozil insists his Arsenal future has nothing to do with Arsene Wenger staying

author: George Bellshaw
title: Mesut Ozil insists his Arsenal future has nothing to do with Arsene Wenger staying
text:
Ozil’s future is in doubt (Picture: Getty) Mesut Ozil has opened the possibility to staying at Arsenal , regardless of Arsene Wenger’s future at the club.
The Germany international had previously hinted that he would leave the Emirates should the French tactician depart but he now seems willing to extend his stay.
Arsene Wenger sends message to Alexis Sanchez after addressing Arsenal's senior players Both men’s futures are in major doubt, with Wenger under serious pressure after a 10-2 Champions League exit at the hands of Bayern Munich, while also not mounting a title challenge.
Ozil’s contract expires at the end of next season and there’s also talk of his exit as his future remains so uncertain.
But Ozil has given the strongest indication yet he will be at the Emirates next season.
Wenger’s future is unclear (Picture: Getty) ‘I’ve always said that I feel at Arsenal: the club, the fans, the city – it’s all here.
‘Arsène Wenger was also one of the main reasons why I came to Arsenal.
More: Football Antonio Conte orders Chelsea to make shock cut-price bid for Manchester United star 
Alexis Sanchez an 'outcast' at Arsenal with players 'fed up' of him 
Antonio Conte warns his Chelsea stars over Paul Pogba's biggest threat 
‘But I also know that it can sometimes go fast in football and much different than you plan.
‘So it would be wrong to say that my future depends only on the coach.’
MORE: Sanchez an ‘outcast’ at Arsenal with players ‘fed up’ of him
